segments.text: I notice the details in this kitchen drawing right away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink holds her plate so carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the faucet's on, and water's flooding out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over the sink edge in a steady stream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, focused only on drying that one dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is widening quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Behind her, the boy is on a stool that's tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A plate in his other hand, like he's prepared.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands close, arm up, waiting eagerly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window reveals a serene garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's startling how the calm outside ignores the indoor peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a fall or slip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between routine and risk is eye-opening.
segments.speaker: PAR
